entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Rain beginning before morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
